text:
Unable to login into ColdFusion MX7 Administration (installed on Tomcat 5.5.23).
If you type the correct password you are prompted for password again.

It works correctly with Tomcat 6.0.14 and minor version.
It doesn't work with Tomcat 6.0.16
creator: mauro.biagi@diennea.com

text:
This works for me with the latest source.

I haven't looked too deeply at this but given that the login process uses POST and the versions you see issues with this looks very much like a duplicate of bug 44494

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 44494 ***
creator: markt@apache.org
